description:
Incidents around steamed buns make life difficult for Rinne and Rokumon. Later, Rinne experiences a problem originating from a mysterious package of mushrooms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nakami ga Nai / Koshikudake Saka no Kai / Matsutake no Hamon
Nothing Inside / Mystery of Koshikudake Hill / Effect of the Matsutake Mushroom
Rien à l`intérieur / Le mystère de la côte insurmontable / Les rides du matsutake
中身がない / 腰砕け坂の怪 / 松茸の波紋
